description.value:
Select two trances you know. When you satisfy the activation requirements of both auras, you activate both auras, regardless of which of the two trances you are in.

 

While in either trance, and when you satisfy the activation requirements for both of the auras of the trances, both auras are activated instead of only one of them.

 

For example, if you took Matter Trance and chose Life and Matter as your two trances, you may activate both Life Trance Aura and Matter Trance Aura upon hitting an enemy.
